entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Clear early this evening then partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Sunday 2 April 2023
